text: Abraha is a name from Ethiopia that has been used for many years and is still commonly used today. It means "father of multitudes" or "father of many nations" and comes from the Amharic language, which is Ethiopia's official language. Abraha is usually given to boys but can also be given to girls. == People == * Abraha Asfaha, Eritrea's Minister of Public Works and Construction * Abraha Hadush (born 1982), Ethiopian long-distance runner * Abraha Kassa, Director of National Security for Eritrea ==References== Category:Names
title: Abraha
